column5: The Hamster died.... I knew I shoulda got one of the witttle wee ones at the Pet Store. Bad Santa..   My daughter is ok with it. She says Nanny has a hamster now. My Son is indifferent. My wife is crushed. Me....well I only looked at him as bait.  ..I wonder if Dead bait is good for Spring pike fishing. I guess its freezer time. Not to use as bait...so I can burry the thing out back when the ground thaws.... I think a little one is in order this time.      Springs on its way......Winternet is almost over....
OH NO!!!   I know how much you loved that little furry guy!
Dead stick that sucker below a float off a nice deep weedline in the spring.
Yeah but I've never heard of people havin' hamster stew.....

did he die from methane poisoning? not that their is anything wrong with that......( now thats funny I don't care who you are)  Now that I got the joke out of the way....sorry your hamster died but yea they are good muskie bait after you dig a hole and "bury" the cigar box he was in.    Art
The custom with hamsters is to paint them chartreuse, then give them a burial at sea.  Condolences.  (good luck)  p.-
If you can believe this, ours died today too!!
And here I was thinking of getting my neice one, soon.  Hamster flu?   dsn
